author: Sirw2p
content: Well! it's not bad for explain to any person who didnt know about this.. Cross-origin-scripting? :s i have never know about this flag.

author: pdp
content: yep, the presentation was mostly taken from very high angle. As far as the Cross-origin Scripting thing, I believe that this is the correct way to explain cross-site scripting and cross-zone scripting bugs, as we are not scripting SITES but different ORIGINS... therefore, Cross-origin scripting. It is much easier to use this one to describe things without too much repetition.
